version_description:
1.Add device activation function.
2.Support the adding of video intercom system and relevant functions, such as door station viewing, door station call answering, unlocking, alarm receiving.
3.The main interface position adjustment.
4.Bug fixes.
1.Bug fixes.

1.Support Device SD card initialization
2.Bug fixes.

1.Support Hikvision alarm host product.
2.Fix some bugs.
1. Fixed bugs

1.Added support for 9, 12 and 16 split-screen playback.
2.Added support for 17 languages, including Russian, French, Italian, German, Portuguese, Spanish, Hungarian, Greek, Czech, Polish, Dutch, Vietnamese, Hebrew, Latvian, Arabic, Bulgarian, and Romanian.
3.Improved user experience.

1) Supports adding the device without login.
2) Supports adding the device via IP/Domain.
3) Supports adding the device via Hik-Connect Domain.

1) Sharing of Hik-Connect domain name supported.
2) Push services improved.
3) Some bugs fixed

1) Optimize live view interface: The Hik-Connect module and Device module use the same live view interface.
2) Add help document.
3) Support PTZ control in full screen mode.
4) Support zoom function.
5) Add 19 language
6) Fix some bug.
7) Optimize the notification of alarm information.

Optimize Home page; Support selecting multiple cameras for live view.
Optimize live view module; Support slide to switch the camera in live view module.
Optimize playback module; Support 4 window divisions in playback module.
Support video sharing and managing sharing settings.
Support adding cameras to Favorites.
Support adding preset in PTZ function.
Support setting PTZ speed.
Optimize streaming speed in live view module.

1、Optimize home page: Support switching between the screenshot mode and the list mode.
2、Optimize sharing permissions: Support sharing permissions of capturing, recording, zooming, and editing preset.
3、Optimize live view in landscape mode: Support changing video qualities.
4、Optimize playback: Support selecting time before playing videos.

1.Optimize live view performance in multiple windows mode and make live view more fluent.
2.Auto detect the device type and enter the corresponding adding page.
3.Switch between thumbnail and list mode on home page. Slide device to left in list mode to share and set.
4.Preview live view in small window on home page.
5.Optimize UI design of live view page. Slide to view all live videos.
6.Share by device or channel. Receive sharing notifications.
7.Optimize feedback function on the Message page.

1.Add access control related functions.
2.Optimize feedback function: Support hiding feedback panel.

1.Upgrade online devices added by IP/Domain.
2.Adapt to iPhone X.
3.Add channel-zero enabling/disabling switch. By default, it is disabled.
4.Support sharing saved photo and video.
5.Bug fixed.

1.Upgrade online devices added by IP/Domain.
2.Adapt to iPhone X.
3.Add channel-zero enabling/disabling switch. By default, it is disabled.
4.Support sharing saved photo and video.
5.Bug fixed.
Bug fixed.

1. Optimized the Home page and the Live View page.
2. Supports sharing/deleting the captured pictures and recorded video files in batch.
3. Supports clearing all alarm messages.
4. Bug fixed.

1. Optimized the Home page and the Live View page.
2. Supports sharing/deleting the captured pictures and recorded video files in batch.
3. Supports clearing all alarm messages.
4. Bug fixed.

1. Optimized the Home page and the Live View page.
2. Supports sharing/deleting the captured pictures and recorded video files in batch.
3. Supports clearing all alarm messages.
4. Bug fixed.

1.Supports the intercom door station with two locks.
2.Supports more countries and regions.
3.Increased volume of two-way audio.
4.Optimized ringtone of intercom door station and doorbell.
5.Bug fixed

1.Supports sharing devices with others by scanning his/her QR code.
2.Supports manually configuring the alarm output of NVR or DVR after the device being added via Hik-Connect domain.
3.Supports displaying the statuses of multiple HDDs in a NVR or DVR.
4.Enhances the success rate of scanning QR codes generated from devices.
5.Fixes bugs.

1. New design for tablets. Provides better user experience by displaying all the interfaces in landscape mode on tablet.
2. Provides third-party protocol to integrate the app with third-party apps.
3. Fixes bugs.

1. Supports switching countries(or regions) on the login page.
2. Bug fixes and enhancements.
Supports resetting DVR’s password by scanning the QR code displayed on the device’s GUI (The DVR should support this function).

1.Supports Hikvision’s latest wireless security control panel DS-PWA32-XXX.
a) Installation and configuration of the system and all sensors;
b) Arming/disarming of the system;
c) Instant notifications of the alarms with video verification;
2.Added FAQ to provide answers for some frequently-asked questions. Tap More->FAQ to view more details.
3.Optimized UI of the Sharing Device module, and enhanced page-loading speed and fluency. Tap More->Manage Sharing Settings to view more details.
4.Supports login by authenticating fingerprint, safeguarding your privacy.
5.Supports deleting account.
6.Supports sharing device on the Live View page in Visitor mode.
7.Bug fixes and enhancements.

1.Optimize the password reset process of DVR, no longer need to configure the email address in advance, device version V4.24.000 or above is needed.
2.Support new Wi-Fi Camera IPC-P220-D/W and CS-LC1-A0, please contact your installers for more information.
3.Alarm notification from thermal & optical network camera will have two capture pictures, thermal view and optical view.
4.Bug fixes and enhancements.

1. Supports the DS-HD1 model of Wi-Fi doorbell.
2. Supports remembering the manually configured main stream/sub-stream options for the live view of a channel. When you starting live view of the channel next time, its live video will be played in the resolution you selected automatically.
3. Optimized the quality of the zoomed-in image.
4. Optimized the UI of the All Partitions page. Supports displaying all zones and peripheral devices on the All Partitions page (not supported in previous versions).
5. Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bugs fixed.
bugs fixed.

1.Support the to-be-released new access control device (Model: DS-K1T331 series). You can open the door remotely by biometric verification of the phone, and also able to live view the camera on device remotely.
2.Support Axiom security control panel for more configuration functions. Such as add cameras to the security control panels, phone call and SMS configuration and partition 3.Support Pyronix devices’ alarm notification, get alarm history and do video verification.
4.For video intercom device, support open doors on main page directly.
5.Bug fixes and enhancements.

1.Optimized the processes for sharing devices among users to enhance usability.
2.Supports silencing notifications from devices. And the silenced notifications can be checked on Notification list.
3.Supports turning on/off the siren of DVRs by just one-touch.
4.Supports directly switching to a specific date for playback in tablet mode.
5.Bug fixes.

1.Supports main stream in 4-window mode live view and remembering the definition and fluency settings of a channel.
2.Optimized the interface style and structure of Help and FAQ, and supports search content by keywords.
3.Supports EN certificated wireless security control panel.
4.Supports displaying both the device name and channel name for the video device in the alarm information.
5.Increased the minimum requirement for password strength to improve account security.
6.Bug fixes.

1.Support LINE App linkage, LINE can receive device alarm notification and alarm related pictures. (Limited to Thailand and Taiwan).
2.Shared users also support setting device’s silence mode.
3.Click on the message in the phone’s notification center to go directly to the details page of the message.
4.Support EZVIZ doorbell.
5.Support to control the camera's wiper on and off.
6.Bug fixes.

1.Support the to-be-released new access control device (Model: DS-K1T8003 series).
2.Support more PTZ operations under tablet mode (or landscape mode), such as preset settings, zoom control, focus control, and iris control, etc.
3.Supports more alarm types of the thermal imaging devices, including temperature alarm, temperature pre-alarm, ship detection, and temperature difference alarm.
4.Updated the picture for displaying the Reset button of the wireless device.
5.Optimized the pop-up window of notifications on the Mobile Client.
6.Bug fixes and enhancements.

1.Supports semisphere view and cylindrical-surface view for fisheye cameras (63x5G0 and 63x5G1).
2.Supports alert tones different from that of the OS for important alarm information of wireless security control panels.
3.Supports adding cameras to Favorites in tablet mode.
4.Supports displaying the region of the account on Account Management page.
5.Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.

1.Supports searching devices, channels, and favorites in the device list page.
2.Supports filtering event history by date and device.
3.Supports sharing wireless security control panels to others.
4.Supports transferring the devices in your account to another person's account, and then the transferred devices no longer belong to you and the target account will have all the configuration and operation permissions of the devices.
5.Bug fixes and enhancements.
bugs fixed.

1.Enhanced device’s security level. For devices added via IP/Domain, or devices (DDNS is enabled) added via Hik-Connect, if the account has no permission to access Remote Parameter Settings, the Remote Configuration button will be unavailable or not be displayed.
2.Fixed some bugs.

1.Support the to-be-released new access control device (Model: DS-K1T8003 series).
2.Support more PTZ operations under tablet mode (or landscape mode), such as preset settings, zoom control, focus control, and iris control, etc.
3.Supports more alarm types of the thermal imaging devices, including temperature alarm, temperature pre-alarm, ship detection, and temperature difference alarm.
4.Updated the picture for displaying the Reset button of the wireless device.
5.Optimized the pop-up window of notifications on the Mobile Client.
6.Bug fixes and enhancements.

1.Supports main stream in 4-window mode live view and remembering the definition and fluency settings of a channel.
2.Optimized the interface style and structure of Help and FAQ, and supports search content by keywords.
3.Supports EN certificated wireless security control panel.
4.Supports displaying both the device name and channel name for the video device in the alarm information.
5.Increased the minimum requirement for password strength to improve account security.
6.Bug fixes.

1.Supports main stream in 4-window mode live view and remembering the definition and fluency settings of a channel.
2.Optimized the interface style and structure of Help and FAQ, and supports search content by keywords.
3.Supports EN certificated wireless security control panel.
4.Supports displaying both the device name and channel name for the video device in the alarm information.
5.Increased the minimum requirement for password strength to improve account security.
6.Bug fixes.
Optimized the user experience when the Axiom devices running on GPRS networks.

1.Optimized the processes for sharing devices among users to enhance usability.
2.Supports silencing notifications from devices. And the silenced notifications can be checked on Notification list.
3.Supports turning on/off the siren of DVRs by just one-touch.
4.Supports directly switching to a specific date for playback in tablet mode.
5.Bug fixes.

1.Support LINE App linkage, LINE can receive device alarm notification and alarm related pictures. (Limited to Thailand and Taiwan).
2.Shared users also support setting device’s silence mode.
3.Click on the message in the phone’s notification center to go directly to the details page of the message.
4.Support EZVIZ doorbell.
5.Support to control the camera's wiper on and off.
6.Bug fixes.
Bugs fixed.
Bugs fixed.

1.Supports adjusting the playback speed for video footage from DVRs and NVRs.
2.Supports new coming security control panel hybrid version.
3.Supports new coming Hikvision Wi-Fi cameras.
4.Optimized the user interface for the security control panel.
Bugs fixed.
bugs fixed.
bugs fixed.
bugs fixed.

1.Support the to-be-released new access control device (Model: DS-K1T331 series). You can open the door remotely by biometric verification of the phone, and also able to live view the camera on device remotely.
2.Support Axiom security control panel for more configuration functions. Such as add cameras to the security control panels, phone call and SMS configuration and partition 3.Support Pyronix devices’ alarm notification, get alarm history and do video verification.
4.For video intercom device, support open doors on main page directly.
5.Bug fixes and enhancements.

1. Supports the DS-HD1 model of Wi-Fi doorbell.
2. Supports remembering the manually configured main stream/sub-stream options for the live view of a channel. When you starting live view of the channel next time, its live video will be played in the resolution you selected automatically.
3. Optimized the quality of the zoomed-in image.
4. Optimized the UI of the All Partitions page. Supports displaying all zones and peripheral devices on the All Partitions page (not supported in previous versions).
5. Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bugs fixed.

1.Optimize the password reset process of DVR, no longer need to configure the email address in advance, device version V4.24.000 or above is needed.
2.Support new Wi-Fi Camera IPC-P220-D/W and CS-LC1-A0, please contact your installers for more information.
3.Alarm notification from thermal & optical network camera will have two capture pictures, thermal view and optical view.
4.Bug fixes and enhancements.

The new version of Hik-Connect (V4.0.0) provides a new design and better experience.
1.Optimized UI and visual design to provide a more user-friendly experience.
2.Supports event playback in the playback module, which provides a convenient way to view the event-related video footage of a specific device.
3.Supports sharing a specific device to another user via the icon on the device list.

The new version of Hik-Connect provides a new design and better experience.
1.Optimized UI and visual design to provide a more user-friendly experience.
2.Supports event playback in the playback module, which provides a convenient way to view the event-related video footage of a specific device.
3.Supports sharing a specific device to another user via the icon on the device list.

1.Optimize the interactive page of the intercom products and doorbells, and display the historical call records on the device’s main page;
2.In the process of adding a device, if the device has already been bound, we recommend that you find the previous account as prompted;
3.The Flood Light device supports manually turning on and off the active alarm switch;
4.We strongly recommend that the visitor account be upgraded to an official account to avoid being unable to add the device again after changing the phone;

1.Supports setting motion detection area for network cameras.
2.Supports configuring Wi-Fi network via Access Point for access control devices.
3.Supports viewing video footage of both of the two channels of thermal binoculars when receiving alarm notifications from the devices.
4.Added a new entry for configuring network of Wi-Fi camera on the More page.

1. In tablet mode, UI style is updated, and some pages are optimized, such as pages for access control devices and video intercom devices.
2. Support reset the DVR’s password by scanning its QR code.
3. Support drawing the motion detection area for C6N, LC1 and DB1.
4. When a customer open the app and select his/her region, the current region is selected by default.

1. In tablet mode, UI style is updated, and some pages are optimized, such as pages for access control devices and video intercom devices.
2. Support reset the DVR’s password by scanning its QR code.
3. Support drawing the motion detection area for C6N, LC1 and DB1.
4. When a customer open the app and select his/her region, the current region is selected by default.

1. Supports AX Pro security control panel.
2. Supports more functionality of Axiom Hybrid security control panel.
3. Optimized the device sharing procedures, you can share device by QR code.
4. Supports setting the display language of the Mobile Client to Ukrainian.
5. Supports vandal-resistant door station (DS-KB8113-IME1).

1.Supports adding multiple devices by scanning the QR code which contains the information of these devices. The QR code can be generated on iVMS-4200 client software, iVMS 4500 mobile client, or via the local menu of the device (Specific model supported).
2.Supports switching scenes (Stay, Away, Sleep, and Custom) for indoor station.

1.Supports adding multiple devices by scanning the QR code which contains the information of these devices. The QR code can be generated on iVMS-4200 client software, iVMS 4500 mobile client, or via the local menu of the device (Specific model supported).
2.Supports switching scenes (Stay, Away, Sleep, and Custom) for indoor station.
some bugs fixed

1. When the access control device is shared with other users, others can open and close the door remotely;
2. Support more functions of AX Pro to provide a better experience;
3. Supports enabling/disabling the light of ColorVu camera;
4. Compatible with ip camera that has two channels;
5. Support to modify nickname;

1. When the access control device is shared with other users, others can open and close the door remotely;
2. Support more functions of AX Pro to provide a better experience;
3. Supports enabling/disabling the light of ColorVu camera;
4. Compatible with ip camera that has two channels;
5. Support to modify nickname;

1. Support Wireless Alarm System - AX PRO more wireless peripherals, such as Wall Switch, Relay Module, Smart Plug, Repeater.
2. Significantly optimize the interaction of the notification module.

1. Support more peripherals of the wireless security panel, such as relay model, wall switch, and smart plug.
2. Support new IP camera - solar camera.
3. Supports viewing video tutorials about how to share device to others.
4. Optimized the UI design of the Notification module.
5. Fixed compatibility issues with iOS 14.

1. Optimize the process of receiving delivered devices from Hik-ProConnect.
2. Added a "Cloud service" page, where you can view device linkage records, flow control solution, and manage installer’s permissions.
3. Support receive “Unregistered Tag” notification from AxPro wireless alarm system.
4. Remove Visitor Mode entrance from homepage.
5. Not all features are available in every country or region.

1. Expanded push notification capability. 39 languages are now available for push notifications.
2. Video intercom device user can mute calls from the device.
3. Two-way audio is no longer turned on automatically after user answers calls from a video intercom device.
4. Added support for more wireless peripheral devices, such as PIR curtain detector, window curtain detector, and PIR ceiling detector.
5. Fixed an issue that could cause the app to crash occasionally.

1. Support new cloud time attendance solution, this solution need enabled through Hik-ProConnect by service providers, and not available in all countries or regions currently.
2. Optimize the problem of automatic logout under abnormal network conditions.
3. Support AX Pro ‘s second SIM card configuration.

1. Support new cloud time attendance solution, this solution need enabled through Hik-ProConnect by service providers, and not available in all countries or regions currently.
2. Optimize the problem of automatic logout under abnormal network conditions.
3. Support AX Pro ‘s second SIM card configuration.

1. Enable critical alerts
2. Supports controlling and configuring the more detectors with AX Pro Hub, such as smoke detector, heat detector and CO detector.
3. Support solar power 4G network camera.
4. Support customize area background for AX Pro Hub.
5. Support stay arm an area, only work with AX Pro Hub.
6. Support remotely open/close relays on indoor station.

1. Enable critical alerts
2. Supports controlling and configuring the more detectors with AX Pro Hub, such as smoke detector, heat detector and CO detector.
3. Support solar power 4G network camera.
4. Support customize area background for AX Pro Hub.
5. Support stay arm an area, only work with AX Pro Hub.
6. Support remotely open/close relays on indoor station.

Enable critical alerts
Supports controlling and configuring the more detectors with AX Pro Hub, such as smoke detector, heat detector and CO detector.
Support solar power 4G network camera.
Support customize area background for AX Pro Hub.
Support stay arm an area, only work with AX Pro Hub.
Support remotely open/close relays on indoor station.

1. Now you can check In/Out on the Mobile Client
2. You can change the settings on answering video intercom calls in More → Settings → Auto Answer
3. You can turn off the supplement light or set to auto adjust and set a limit for maximum luminance.
4. Improved Noise Reduction for Two-Way Audio.
5. Your installer can set up a Hik-ProConnect Box as a proxy device to connect devices that do not support Hik-Connect service to the service.
6. Some features may not be available for all regions.
Compatible with iOS14.6 search LAN devices

1.HIKVISION has established a data center in India for local storage and processing of data.
2.Bug fixes.
